name: Square Cram
description:
Instructions:

- Fill in a 9x9 grid with tetrominoes and trominoes to complete a board.

- You will need at least 40 squares filled to progress to next level.

- Each square you leave blank will become a hole in the board for the next level(s).

- Change the color of your game

PC CONTROLS: LEFT and RIGHT to turn piece; DOWN to place piece.

Follow the development of my other games at: www.voidedpixels.com
